title: Privacy Policy
introduction: Love Story Unicorns (“we,” “us,” or “our”) is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use the Love Story Unicorns mobile application (“App”). Please read this policy carefully to understand our views and practices regarding your personal data.

subsections.title: 1.1 Personal Information
subsections.content: We may collect the following types of personal information when you register, use, or interact with our App:
points: Profile information, such as photos and preferences

subsections.title: 1.2 Non-Personal Information
points: Device information (e.g., device type, operating system, and unique device identifier)
App usage data (e.g., features accessed, interactions, and session duration)
Cookies and similar tracking technologies (for analytics and personalization)

sections.title: 2. How We Use Your Information
points: Match you with other users based on preferences and compatibility
Provide and manage app features and services
Communicate with you about updates, promotions, and customer service
Monitor and analyze usage trends to improve the App
Protect against fraudulent, unauthorized, or illegal activity

sections.title: 3. Sharing Your Information
sections.content: We may share your information in the following circumstances:

subsections.title: 3.1 With Your Consent
subsections.content: We may share your information with other users as part of the matching process or when you choose to share information in chats or profiles.

subsections.title: 3.2 Service Providers
subsections.content: We may share your information with third-party service providers who assist in:

subsections.title: 3.3 Legal Compliance
subsections.content: We may disclose your information if required to comply with legal obligations or protect our rights and property.

subsections.title: 3.4 Business Transfers
subsections.content: In the event of a merger, acquisition, or sale of assets, your information may be transferred to the new entity.

subsections.title: 4.1 Access and Update
subsections.content: You can access and update your personal information through your account settings.

subsections.title: 4.2 Opt-Out
points: Disable location services in your device settings
Opt-out of marketing emails by clicking “unsubscribe”

subsections.title: 4.3 Delete Your Account
subsections.content: You may request account deletion by contacting [support email]. Please note that we may retain certain data for legal or legitimate business purposes.

sections.title: 5. Data Security
sections.content: We use industry-standard measures to protect your information, including encryption and secure servers. However, no method of transmission or storage is completely secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security.

sections.title: 6. Children’s Privacy
sections.content: Our App is not intended for users under 18. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 18. If we discover such data, we will delete it promptly.

sections.title: 7. International Data Transfers
sections.content: If you are accessing the App from outside the United States, your data may be transferred to, stored, and processed in the United States. By using the App, you consent to this transfer.

sections.title: 8. Changes to This Privacy Policy
sections.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Any changes will be effective when we post the updated policy in the App. Your continued use of the App after such updates constitutes your acknowledgment and acceptance.

sections.title: 9. Contact Us
points: 2354 Stone Road, Ann Arbor, Michigan, United States 48105

conclusion: By using Love Story Unicorns, you agree to this Privacy Policy. Thank you for trusting us with your personal information.
